*Blizzard walks into the Pred base while holding Sinesis. Twister follows* =
*Blizzard sits Sinesis down and sighs* Blizzard: I think were going to need=
 anlot of parts. *Blizzard once again sighs*
  ----- Original Message -----=
 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, July 16, 2000 =
5:03 AM
  Subject: Neo Beast Wars


  Dracona walks up to the Predacon (Meg=
atron's) base and looks at it. It didn't notice her, so she went closer and=
 inspected it. She looked around it, making notes of certain things.

  Pli=
ntissa followed Artist out in the missle of no where in a desert. Artist tu=
rned around and looked at Plintissa.

  "Plintissa now see Artist's secret =
treasure!" Artist said. He smiled. Plintissa was stunned. Artist dug a litt=
le in the sand, and brought up a hermit crab shell. Artist laughed and ran =
off laughing giddily. Plintissa sighed and turned back. No wait, maybe this=
 way was back. No wait, that way. Plintissa realized she was lost, and that=
 Artist was nowhere to be found. She looked around from left to right. Oh, =
what was the use, she might as well be dead out on the desert anyhow, she o=
bviously wasn't needed, not even Dracona stuck around with her! She had tho=
ught that Iron Raptor was her friend, but that blew up in her face. Then sh=
e made the mistake of trusting some bot sho said he would help her, and the=
n she went off and nobody trusted her any longer. Plintissa walked off into=
 the distance, hoping to find her way home. Then it occured to her. She did=
n't have a home. a single tear fell from Plintissa's eye and she walked on.=


  Artist ran off into the distance and looked back joyfully. Plintissa wa=
sn't there.

  "Yikes! I was supposed to protect her!" Artist said. He ran =
back into the desert, darting quickly mile for mile, trying to find Plintis=
sa.

  Gangon's spark glowed eerily and bumped into BrightBlade's hand.

  =
Sinesis and Sinister lay there, half dead with Sinister in pieces.

  Deemo=
s figures out that this disgusting team must not be right for him and he ru=
ns off, hoping maybe the Maximals would be good enough to let him and his w=
ife join and heal up. He ran along, going quickly, about 2 hours later he f=
ound the Maximal base. Inzola was in his arms in stasis lock and spitting o=
ut blood, she was bleeding internally. Deemos whimpered and aproached the M=
aximal base.

  "Attention! Maximals! I wish to join you, as does my wife a=
nd cohort, Inzola! Let me it, Inzola is in critical condition!" Deemos said=
.

  The Radicons ceased their walk and sat down in a forest. Airbomber sig=
hed.

  "Food would be good about now." Train Wreck said. Arrow smiled.

  =
"Wait here, I'll go get something!" Arrow said. He went running off. Blende=
r and Stronghold shrugged, Stronghold staring into the distance and Blender=
 scanning the area. Stranato and Train Wreck look at each other and gulp. A=
rrow must be their chef now.

  "I hope you like what Arrow makes." Airbomb=
er said to Infectra. (If she's there.)

-----------------------------------=
-------------------------------------------



----------------------------=
--------------------------------------------------
